page.title: 08A FAMILY DAY IN HOLYWELL
page.content: {7.00am}Get up,breakfast-toast and tea. {7.30am}Listen to radio,prepare packed lunches for husband and children. {8.00am}Children's breakfast and check that they are ready for school. {8.40am}Take children to school. {9.00am}Shopping,housework,prepare evening meal.{12noon}Snack lunch. {12.30pm}Look after toddlers while their parents attend adult classes. {3.00pm}Collect children from school. {3.15pm}Dental appointment for child. {4.00pm}Ironing.Complete preparations for evening meal.{6.00pm}Evening meal. {7.00pm}Clear up after meal while husband prepares children for bed. {8.00pm}Attend Scanner Appeal Meeting Husband at home studying for exam. {9.00pm}Return home,read daily paper, watch television.Husband prepares snack supper. {10.45pm}Go to bed.
